text.0: may agni yielding to our prayer the rakṣasslayer drive away.
text.1: the malady of evil name that hath beset thy labouring womb.
text.2: agni concurring in the prayer drive off the eater of the flesh.
text.3: the malady of evil name that hath attacked thy babe and womb.
text.4: that which destroys the sinking germ the settled moving embryo.
text.5: that which will kill the babe at birtheven this will we drive far away.
text.6: that which divides thy legs that it may lie between the married pair.
text.7: that penetrates and licks thy sideeven this will we exterminate.
text.8: what rests by thee in borrowed form of brother lover or of lord.
text.9: and would destroy thy progenyeven this will we exterminate.
text.10: that which through sleep or darkness hath deceived thee and lies down by thee.
text.11: and will destroy thy progenyeven this will we exterminate.
